        public static void togglePlugin​(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the plugin to toggle

      • getPluginPrefKey

        public static java.lang.String getPluginPrefKey​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the preferences key for a plugin. This is used as key for plugin settings. Format: AC_PM_{PLUGIN_NAME}
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the plugin
